channel.title: Butterfly on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Butterfly on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Piper Perabo Says There’s Been “Some Discussion” About a ‘Coyote Ugly’ Sequel: “Things Are Moving Around”
item.description: Choosing her words very carefully, the actress tells THR, “People that were integral to making it are in communication about how to do something more.”

item.title: Piper Perabo Says There’s Been “Some Discussion” About a ‘Coyote Ugly’ Sequel: “Things Are Moving Around”
item.description: Choosing her words very carefully, the actress tells THR, “People that were integral to making it are in communication about how to do something more.”
